Events.Details: You will receive Wood (qty 50).

Events.Trigger: Enter Robin's house while she is home.
Events.Details: You see Robin cleaning the dust off her saw. She asks you if you've ever made anything out of wood, and afterwards gives you two blueprints

Choices.Option: Yes.
No.

Events.Trigger: Reach 7 hearts with Robin.
Events.Details: You will receive the recipe for Pumpkin Soup in the mail.

Events.Trigger: At any friendship level greater than 0, you have a chance to receive a gift in the mail.
Events.Details: You will receive either Cactus Fruit, Coconut, or Tom Kha Soup in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Reaching 7 hearts with Sandy.
Events.Details: You will receive a recipe for Tom Kha Soup in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Enter Sebastian's room when he's there.
Events.Details: You find Sebastian is working as a programmer. Sebastian confides in you how he feels nobody takes his job seriously.

Events.Trigger: Go to The Mountain between 11am and 5pm.
Events.Details: Sebastian is working on a motorcycle in the garage at his house. He talks about the journeys he'll take.

Events.Trigger: Enter Sebastian's room when he's there.
Events.Details: Sebastian invites you to play a tabletop RPG with him. You choose your class. The following in-game choices don't affect your relationship with Sebastian.

Choices.Option: Warrior. I like a direct approach.
Healer. I prefer to help others.
Wizard. A sharp mind is the most powerful blade of all.

Events.Trigger: Go to the beach on a rainy day between noon and 11pm.
Events.Details: Sebastian is standing on the boardwalk. He opens up about his anxiety to you.

Events.Trigger: Go to The Mountain between 8pm and midnight.
Events.Details: Sebastian takes on a ride on his motorcycle. Upon reaching a cliff, you both stand overlooking the city. He smokes and asks you what you think.

Choices.Option: It's beautiful.
It gives me a strange, sad feeling.
Kind of ugly.
You should quit smoking.

Events.Trigger: Enter Cindersap Forest between 8pm and midnight.
Events.Details: Shane shares a beer with you and opens up a bit. The event ends with you having the 'tipsy' condition.

Events.Trigger: Reach 3 hearts with Shane.
Events.Details: You receive the recipe for Strange Bun and Pepper Poppers in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Enter Marnie's Ranch at any time.
Events.Details: Shane is found passed out from drinking. He expresses fear about future and lack of a plan.

Events.Trigger: Enter Cindersap Forest between 9am and 8pm while storming or raining.
Events.Details: Shane is on the edge of the cliff, drunk, and asks you why he shouldn't just roll of the cliff right there.

Choices.Option: Because there's so much to live for!
Jas needs you. You're like a father to her.
It would be a sin.
The decision is your own. Just know that I'm here for you.

Events.Trigger: Occurs the next morning after the previous 6-heart event.
Events.Details: You help take Shane to a hospital. The next day he comes to your farm to apologize to you and tells you he's going to seek counselling.

Choices.Option: I'm glad I was there to help.
You needed a serious wake-up call.
I'm just happy you're still here.

Events.Trigger: Enter Marnie's Ranch while Shane is home after triggering the 6-heart event.
Events.Details: Shane is happier since he's stopped drinking. With the money he saved he can afford to give Jas a present.

Events.Trigger: Enter the town between 10am and 4pm on a Sunny day. You also need 2 hearts with both Emily and Clint.
Events.Details: Shane is filming a scene for Joja Cola feature Emily and Clint. You can help him by being an extra.

Events.Trigger: Enter Marnie's Ranch while Shane is home.
Events.Details: There is a scene with Shane in a chicken coop.

Events.Trigger: Exist your house before 6:30 am to initiate the event, then walk to the Bus Stop between 4pm and 6pm.
Events.Details: Shane invites you to see a gridball team in Zuzu City. He asks you about what you think of the game.

Choices.Option: Noisy...It makes me appreciate how peaceful it is back home.
Fun...Pelican Town seems really boring in comparison.

Events.Trigger: Reach 8 hearts with Vincent and then speak with him.
Events.Details: Vincent will ask you to keep a secret; he wants to marry Penny when he grows older.

Events.Trigger: Reach 8 hearts with both Vincent and Jas, then enter Cindersap Forest during Spring on a sunny day between 6am and 5pm.
Events.Details: Vincent explains how to clean Spring Onions. You gain Spring Onion Mastery afterwards, which increases sells prices of Spring Onions by 5x.

Events.Trigger: Reach 3 hearts with Willy.
Events.Details: You will receive a recipe for Chowder in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Reach 5 hearts with Willy.
Events.Details: You will receive the recipe for Escargot in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Enter The Beach between 6am and 5:10pm.
Events.Details: Willy asks for your help inside the Fish Shop. You see crabs running amok, but soon Gus comes in and offers to buy them all. For the next 3 days, Gus will sell unlimited Crab Cakes at the Saloon for 550g each.

Events.Trigger: Reach 7 hearts with Willy.
Events.Details: You will receive the recipe for Fish Stew in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Reach 9 hearts with Willy.
Events.Details: You will receive the recipe for Lobster Bisque in the mail.

Events.Trigger: At any friendship level greater than 0, you have a chance to receive a gift in the mail.
Events.Details: You will receive either Fire Quartz, Frozen Tear, Jade, or Purple Mushroom in the mail.

Events.Trigger: Reachi 4 hearts with the Wizard.
Events.Details: You gain access to the basement of the Wizard's Tower, where you can change your appearance at the Shrine of Illusions for 500g.
